description: Episode number 1 of Series "Why we fight". First in a series of documentaries made to acquaint soldiers with the causes and events leading up to the U.S.A.'s entry into World War II. This episode concentrates on the threat posed by the rise of German/Italian fascism and Japanese imperialism to world freedom. Narrated by John Huston. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
